summary: This header file contains the declaration of the TCRecognition class, which provides methods for recognition and learning tasks in a system. The methods include rRecognition, pRecognition, feedbackRecognition, and actionRecognition that operate on different types of models and data.

details.comment: This header file contains the declaration of the TCRecognition class, which provides methods for recognition and learning tasks in a system. The methods include rRecognition, pRecognition, feedbackRecognition, and actionRecognition that operate on different types of models and data.
